description: Raa Erusu Miryuu comes from planet Raa Metaru. He is an underling of Queen Millennium Raa Andromeda Prometheum II (who dons the Japanese name Yukino Yayoi). Under the Japanese name Yamori Daisuke, he accompanies her on her thousand-year long hidden reign on Earth. His love for the queen is unrequited. Taciturn, passionnate and brave, with a spirit of sacrifice, but jealous and prejudiced against human beings, he finds himself torn between loyalties in the conflict opposing Raa Metaru and Earth.
name: Raa Erusu Miryuu
